network.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Server class which manages the games, the connections and contains the main thread.

      • nameAvailable

        public boolean nameAvailable(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if a name is already registered in the playerLobby
        Parameters:
        name - to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the name is available, false if it's not.

      • checkAfk

        public boolean checkAfk(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if a player with the given name is currently afk in one of the games.
        Parameters:
        name - to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if there is an afk player with the given name, false if there isn't.

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(ClientConnection c,
                      java.lang.String name)
        Adds a player to the lobby and the waiting room for a new game.
        Parameters:
        c - ClientConnection of the player.
        name - of the player.

      • checkConnected

        private void checkConnected()
        Checks if enough players are in the waiting room to start a timer for the creation of a new game.

      • startTimer

        private void startTimer()
        Timer method called before creating a new game. If it reaches its end a new game will be started with the players currently in the waiting room. It will start a new game if at any moment during the countdown five players are detected in the waiting room. It will be interrupted at any moment if there are less than three players in the waiting room.

      • createGame

        private void createGame()
        Method for the creation of the game. It creates the necessary classes for the management of the connections and the game. It saves the necessary instances for a possible reconnection the attributes of the server. At the end of the initializations it starts the Game and clears the waiting room.

      • closeGame

        public void closeGame(int id)
        Method called from the Game class at the end of the game. It clears the server from all instances of the game and its players.
        Parameters:
        id - of the game to be closed.

      • run

        private void run()
        Main thread of the server. Listen to the socket for new Clients and registers them.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
